mapper.insert: insert member(memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberPhone1, memberPhone2, memberPhone3, memberMail, memberAddr1, memberAddr2, memberAddr3) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone1}, #{memberPhone2}, #{memberPhone3}, #{memberMail}, #{memberAddr1}, #{memberAddr2}, #{memberAddr3})
mapper.select: select memberId, memberName from member order by memberId desc
select memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberPhone1, memberPhone2, memberPhone3, memberMail, memberAddr1, memberAddr2, memberAddr3 from member where memberId=#{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET memberName = #{memberName}, memberPhone1 = #{memberPhone1}, memberPhone2 = #{memberPhone2}, memberPhone3 = #{memberPhone3}, memberMail = #{memberMail}, memberAddr1 = #{memberAddr1}, memberAddr2 = #{memberAddr2}, memberAddr3 = #{memberAddr3} WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select memberId, memberPw, memberName, adminCk from member where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPw=#{memberPw}
select memberPw from member where memberId=#{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET memberPw = '-admin', memberName = '-admin', memberPhone1 = '-1', memberPhone2 = '-1', memberPhone3 = '-1', memberMail = '-admin', memberAddr1 = '-admin', memberAddr2 = '-admin', memberAddr3 = '-admin' WHERE memberId = #{memberId} and memberPw = #{memberPw}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where memberId = #{memberId}
